Title: Notification obligation regarding rectification or erasure of personal data or restriction of processing

Content.Description: The controller shall communicate any rectification or erasure of personal data or restriction of processing carried out in accordance with Article 16, Article 17(1) and Article 18.

Recipients.Obligation: The controller must inform each recipient to whom the personal data have been disclosed.

DataSubjectRights.RightToKnow: The controller shall inform the data subject about those recipients if requested.
